title: FTX reorganizing on-chain assets by bridging tokens, consolidating holdings
description:
Bankrupt crypto exchange FTX revealed in a tweet on Sept. 6 that it is in the process of moving its cryptocurrency holdings. The company said that it is moving bridged tokens on multiple networks to their native blockchains. FTX has yet to disclose the specific cryptocurrencies affected by this initiative, as well as the exact […]

The post FTX reorganizing on-chain assets by bridging tokens, consolidating holdings appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Ark Invest files for spot Ethereum ETF
description: Sometimes the investment world receives a jolt that reminds everyone just how rapidly the financial landscape is evolving. Enter the scene: Ark Invest. Teaming up with 21Shares, the duo boldly declared their intent to debut the first-ever U.S.-based Ethereum ETF that would provide direct exposure to Ether – the crypto world’s silver. The move?
